mapper.select: select la.id,la.title,la.personal,la.title_pic,la.publisher,la.found_pic,la.content,la.contact,la.address, la.message_id,la.type_id,lat.type_name,la.is_examine,la.brow,la.is_solve,la.gmt_created from lost_article as la LEFT JOIN lost_article_type as lat on la.type_id=lat.id where la.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} limit 1
